hana brata, tan pamaṅan tan paturu, bratanira saṅ hyaṅ vәkasniṅ kavi viśeṣa. pha, svarga lәvih, titisnya añakravartti, subhaga anulus, anurāga riṅ rāt, katәkan sapinakṣanira riṅ bhūmi, dinuluriṅ āyu, śakti vani mahābhāra.
hana brata, ambhairava pakṣa, siṅ pinaṅan, tuhun tan trәṣṇeṅ turu, bhaṭāra pavakānugrahani, mvaṅ devata, [pha,] bhūta gandharva masih, janmanya puruṣa viśeṣa, subhaga hanulus, ajrih kaṅ sarva galak.
hana brata, tan paṅgilani sarva tinaḍah, sambarana , ṅa, pha, viryavan siddha sugih saṅkan rare.
hana brata, ṅarәṅ, ṅa, amaṅan harәṅ rumuhun[,] bhaṭārī gaṅga hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ gaṅgā ya namah, salek samayanya, pha, apәkik kerәṅan deniṅ jagat.
hana brata, yan amaṅan maivak harәṅ tumpə̄r, pәtaṅ tavun samayanya, pha, keḍәp riṅ samanta janma, kinasihaniṅ rāt, keḍәpiṅ arabi anak anak.
hana brata, maṅan apisan, pituṅ lek pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.
hana brata nitīkrama, ṅa, amaṅan sadina sapisan, saṅ hyaṅ smara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, siṅ prih meṅgal katәmu, dirghyuṣa.
nahan brata, maṅan piṅ saptami, pituṅ lek samayanya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya.
hana brata, ambhūmi amasar bhuvana, ṅa, pha, sugih lәmah sīma.
hana brata, maṅaniṅ lәmah, pituṅ śaśih lavasnya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya, bhūmi ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

hana brata, mañcavara, ṅa, U, marәp maṅetan amaṅan, pa, marәp kidul amaṅan. pva, marәp aṅulon. va, marәp aṅalor amaṅan. ka, siṅ harәpira maṅan, duluranya lalab kabeh, mvaṅ kǝmbaṅ hanūt kadi varṇaniṅ sәga, pañcavarṇa, putih kuniṅ abaṅ Irәṅ, riṅ teṅah pañcavarṇa, deva rata hyaṅnya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga pada bhaṭāra śiva, !pamit!, ma, Om̐ Om̐ śrī jagat guru paduke bhyo namah. sasarnya mañjanma rata añakravr̥tti, tan kapadhān.

hana brata, mañca vara dalәm, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan uyah kevala, amaṅan sәkul kevala, salek tәluṅ dina samayanya, vus maṅkana, ulam kevala, vus maṅkana, toya kevala, vus maṅkana, aṅinaṅ kevala, vus maṅkana lavasnya, kәneṅ paṅan, tan kәneṅ turu, samaṅkana lavasnya, saṅ hyaṅ vәkasiṅ anuṅku rāt hyaṅnya ikaṅ brata, tan upir upir sukanta, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra dharma, janmanya suka maṅan aṅaṅgur, tan aṅhel panambut gave, suka sugih tan pasaṅkan, kaṅ vvaṅ masih deva bikṣuka, muleh iri kita.
hana brata, luhuriṅ kayu, ṅa, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, vrәddhi putra, tur keḍәp siṅ paṅucap.
hana brata, aturu luhuriṅ kayu, salek divasanya, pha, śakti kasiddhyan kapaṅguh.

hana brata, aṅalasa , ṅa, asaṅidaniṅ alas savәguṅ, tan papasa deniṅ voṅ, ṅuniveh sarva sato, asǝp, pha, prajurit riṅ paravu, aṅuṅgahana bahanya, va, harәṅ prajurit riṅ darāt luṅguhana vatu, [devatanya] saṅ buddha subrata, sasarnya dam puvavaṅ riṅ paravu, sugih savah, tur sugih paravu.
hana brata, ṅraka sabran tilәm mvaṅ pūrṇama, sarva putus, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ silih asih maveh brata, pha, tinuṅgviṅ rāma reṇa, suka sugih prih avak, tur tan paṅubiṅ voṅ atuha.
hana brata, maṅan gǝḍaṅ tan kinulitan, tәluṅ vәṅi samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ murṣita hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, apәkik, yen istri mǝṅgǝpiṅ pahyunan, abәcikiṅ buddhi, vruhiṅ kaliṅanya, pituturiṅ bapebu.

hana brata, maṅan tuhuṅ pitpit rumuhun, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik [48r]muñcar, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik aṅuñci pǝpǝt sira turunābrata, pinakabaghā, pinakarūpa, paṅadǝganiṅ vavadon, pinakalistvayu, [pha] drәman manis ta kita, lindihǝn voṅ apәkik, drәman anak anak, aputu riṅ niṣkala.

hana brata, ṅgilir kacaṅ, ṅa, kramanya, aṅuvāsa savәguṅ, amaṅan savәguṅ, hyaṅ prajā sadā hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasarnya mañjanma suka sugih, lәvih anulus, yan lanaṅ puruṣa kula pratyakṣa anurāga kita, sugih pisis riṅ dlāha, yan istri samaṅkana.

hana brata, yan amaṅan sinaren kasumba, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik pari rāja, ṅa, hyaṅ maṇik teja bhūmi turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakarah-dagiṅ, pinakahati, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, listvayu, sәkar analum, akǝmbaṅ avoh riṅ niṣkala.

hana brata, maṅan sәkul sapuluṅ, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik tampa, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakakukusaniṅ śarīra, [pha,] asǝsǝkan kanakāguṅ, kalavan alit, aśrī asambaṅ jarijya, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, tan pәgat sādhana, mvaṅ mās maṇik, kinanti jagat kinanti japa kita riṅ dlāha.

hana brata, maṅān sәkul putih kuniṅ, aṅkǝn kalivon, humārәp purvva, mevaka bhīra, paṅan pisan saṅaṅ kalivon divasanya, Uttamā saṅaṅ vulan, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan hyaṅ antadeva, ya pinakarūpa, pinakasamūha, pinakadirgha yuṣa, yan lanaṅ pinakapәkikan, pinakapolah, pinakararas, yan vadon pinakakahayon pinakapolah , pinakahibon, pha, mulihiṅ svarga bhaṭāra śiva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ prabhu añakravarti, viku, bhujaṅga, śeva sogata, sugih malǝṅkә riṅ mās pirak, sarva sosoca, rare, hulun, kәbo sapi, mrәgādi, vrәddhi putra, tinuṅgviṅ bapebu, kaki nini, ma, Om̐ hram̐ hrim̐ sah parāmaśivāditya ya namah, ahyas.

hana brata, amiśe[49r]ṣa, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahupa, anlasana sәkul, yan vus kinurәn kurәn, ma, Atma tuturakәna mariṅ bhaṭāra viśeṣa, umuṅguh riṅ vindu nadha, sakāla niṣkāla, viśeṣa bhaṭāra baja, maty aturu, maty aluṅguh, maty aṅadǝg, lәsālәyǝp, pavak tan paśarīra sakāla niṣkāla.

hana brata, nūtakǝn saśila bhaṭāra gaṇa, amuṣpa gaṇa, ṅa, yan amaṅan sәga nǝm kǝpǝl, sarahina, tiṅkahiṅ amaṅan, śīla gaṇā, nǝm vulan samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ viku Ijo, śakti dūra darśana, sojar ira keḍǝp.

hana brata, maṅan sәga sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patәdha tan patambǝh, tan apilih ivaknya, Apan mayoni, ṅa, hyaṅ siddhi narasiṅha turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa , pinakalaku , [pha,] siddhaniṅ vaṅ anambadani śabda, sihniṅ rāt, ma, Om̐ Om̐ siddhi kāraṇāya namah svāhā, yan ahyas.
hana brata, jaṅga varṇa, ṅa, amaṅan [49v] sәga balaka, pituṅ dina lavasnya mābhyāsa, pha, keḍәp savuvusta deniṅ rāt, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, biṣa gamǝl aṅiduṅ.

hana brata, jaga śatru, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ saptanala hyaṅniṅ brata, kramanya, taṅgal pisan piṅ ro tәmu taṅgal piṅ pitu, lamun huvus sumurup vulan juga kita vәnaṅ aturu, livat saṅkeṅ taṅgal piṅ pitu, sakarәptāturu, maṅkāneṅ krәṣṇa pakṣa, lamun mәtu vulan juga kita turu, livat saṅke rika, sakarәpta turu, pha, riṅ dadi vvaṅ sugih, tan hana nuskr̥ta , riṅ niṣkāla.
hana brata, mūrāba, ṅa, maṅlәkasa taṅgaliṅ kapat mabrata, maṅana purāṇa, kǝmbaṅ nāgasāri, kulalaṭa, malabahaniṅ pūrṇama , polihnyāpәkik hayu tan pasiriṅ, ma, Om̐ smarāya namah, yan ahyas.
hana brata, taṅgal piṅ savlas, Atikukus, ṅa, phalanya virya, drәman anulus.
hana brata, maṅan aronāron, ulam kalapa binakar, lima vәlas dina divasanya, saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa hyaṅ[50r]niṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ hulon.
hana brata, amaṅan tan paron, pituṅ lek divasanya, pha, siddhakārya, jaya patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
hana brata, ṅavaśakәn sakvehiṅ brata, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra Umapati, [pha,] janmanya prabhu añakravartti, viku śakti bahu sikṣa, labdha vara subhaga.
hana brata, kadi rare, tan kinatәṅǝtakәn , pha, tan pavali valyañjanma kita, sasarnya dadi ratu.
nihan brata, amati agni, asisirih, 3, dina, tan pamaṅan sakalvirnya, tutug 3, dina, alabahan, tur tīrthanana, pha, hilaṅ pāpa kleṣaniṅ śarīra.
hana brata, amaṅan sǝsǝdhǝp rumuhun, pituṅ tavun divasanya, bhaṭārī vastu hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.
hana brata, maṅan mevak uyah harәṅ, pha, keḍәp riṅ rāt, kineriṅan deniṅ bhuvana, kinajrihaniṅ śatru.
Ana brata, mamaṅan catur varṇa, limaṅ vәṅi lavasanya, prajña śakti phalanika, tәhǝr kinasihaniṅ rāt, Apurvva kita, sakabdhu ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
hana brata maṅan riyana, 5, tәluṅ lek lavasnya, pha, halus jarijinta, niromanira.
hana brata, ṅantara, ṅa, maṅan tṅaṅ ve , tәṅah vәṅi, tigaṅ lek lavasnya mabhyāsa, pha, śakti saturasta, suka magə̄ṅ.
hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kәpǝl, sadina, pituṅ rahina samayanya, mabrata, catur ṅaraniṅ brata, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ sarva vәsi tan tumamāhi śariranta, riṅ niṣkāla.

hana brata, yan amaṅan tan paluṅguh, saṅ hyaṅ hayu maveh brata, saṅ hyaṅ laku laku haraniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa hayu raspati, [pha] suka riṅ lakunta, lәbur tampakta aśri iṅiriṅan, deniṅ pavoṅan, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, amūkti sāriniṅ kaḍaton, kita riṅ dlāha.
hana brata, amadhapa, ṅa, amaṅan riṅ paṅkon, malamak patra, saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣma maveh brata, phalanya sapolahta pantǝs, tan pәgat sihniṅ malakya rabi, salek samayanya, ma, Om̐ sūkṣmāya namah, pamit.
hana brata, tan pamaṅan sarvāmbǝkan, naṅkǝn pon, mvaṅ kalivon, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.
hana brata, yan amaṅan aṅilo riṅ pahesan, naṅkǝn pūrṇama, satavun divasanya, pha, mañjanma riṅ kabayan buyut sugih.

nihan aji rambut, amaṅan sәga hirәṅ, naṅkǝn caturthi, śukla pakṣa, ma, hulun aṅaji rambut, tan abaṅ, tan ana raṅraṅ, tan ana putih, sәlǝm abuluniṅ gagak, adava, alambas, atәtәl, ṅkon rambutin hulun, katәmu maṅko, lәvih kaṅ tǝmbe hulun aṅaji rambut, vastu hulun aṅaji rambut, Om̐ sa ba ta A I namā śivāya.
hana brata, mona mūjā, pha, deva masih iri kita.

hana brata, mona, ṅa, yan aṅisiṅ, yan ahuyuh, yan adyus, yan alәlәṅa, yan abasahan, yan lumaku, pituṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra śiva maveh brata, sasarnya sugih duve, sugih vәka, tur keḍәp, mañjanma riṅ mantrī.
I śaka, 1722. Vai, ka, vrә, vara mrakih, praṭipadā riṅ śukla pakṣa, Asuji maśa, rah, 2, tǝṅgǝk, 2. I rika divasanya, pūrṇna linikhita.
